description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ei8c4","text":"This protocol describes the steps to prepare liquid culture medium for Saccharomyces cerevisiae. This liquid medium is used to optimize yeast cultures for fluorescence imaging by the reduction of auto-fluorescence through an abundance of Adenine [1].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Medium preparation with pre-resolved components
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"difqh","text":"This version of the protocol shows the preparation of the medium from SC-XX 10x and YNB 20x solutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Medium preparation from powders
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"but76","text":"Medium preparation from powders In this version of the protocol the medium is prepared by weighting the SC and YNB powders and resolving them in the medium flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aj98s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"410eo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.86","error":false,"guid":"A9CEE45710BE11EF90170A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ab49b","text":"In regard to cover all optional dropout media the amino acid base holds the notification -xx, where xx stand for the amino acid(s) that is as selection factor, missing in the medium.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5u0c","text":"Add  Adenine 100x solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c20l0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6b2k2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nq30","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"F85296DD13E011EFBD300A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6a2ul","text":"The additional Adenine is supposed to repress the Adenine synthesize to reduce a possible accumulation of red pigment [1].","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
